name: Trick or Truth
description:
Everybody deserves candy on Halloween, but adults won't give it to big kids. Fool them by wearing different masks and pretending to be young again! Be careful though, go to the same house with the same mask and they'll figure out the truth!

  • Controls: ((WSAD)) To Move, ((E)) To Interact.

Created by: Metater, Vinadium and jmanholt929

Theme: Mask the Truth
